Text:
V3nDetta_2,
Did you forget me ? You told me that you'll re-do the Jurassic Park Fullscreen collector's edition trilogy -rip 'em in good quality,as the last ones were bad in quality . I have waited for long , at least give a reply saying whether you'll be able to re-do and upload them or not. That would help, otherwise I keep hoping in vain that you would keep your request.  I originally posted the request in your previous Righteous kill torrent-

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6308696/Righteous_Kill_%282008%29_DVDrip_V3nDetta

Thanks again in advance.
Sorry,that line would be "keep your promise" instead of request. My apologies.
Im working a lot of hours. I will have those new versions of Jurrasic Park up ASAP. Sorry for the wait
